ISSUE.TITLE: Django 1.9
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Current stable version of Django is 1.9.2. Django 1.9 has some nice features (new lookups, new core features, improved template engine etc) and bug fixes. Do you have any plans to support Django 1.9? Also, why are you using `django-international`? This package is pre-alpha and last update was in 2014. This can create some problems for update to newer version of Django. Any reasons why this package depends of Django 1.8.3? The latest version of Django 1.8 is 1.8.9.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #295 from PressLabs/294-django-1.8.9 Upgraded django to 1.8.9, fixes #294

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #296 from PressLabs/293-django-1.9.2 django 1.9.2 + requirements update closes #293
